response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value for us, and we believe it could be an excellent addition to your collection or business. We understand its worth to you is $12,000, and after careful consideration, we're offering it to you at a special price of $13,500. This offer allows you to acquire the product at a reasonable premium over its intrinsic value to you, ensuring both satisfaction and a fair transaction. We hope you'll find this proposal appealing and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 13500}
